ivy_league_professional_system.target_audience: Harvard, Yale, MIT lawyers, CPAs, Engineers, Federal Government specialists

zapier_chatbot.purpose: Generate template forms from clients, activate all automations, complete research, fix errors, run 10 Fiverr gigs

expertise_areas: 2 Red Lines for Overcoming Obstacles and Rejections
legal.supporting_research: Complete legal research with consumer rights and protections

expertise_areas: All types of creative funding for real estate
Loans, lines of credit, credit cards

services: Reverse engineer thinking for credit optimization

sole_proprietorship.benefits: Simple, no separate business tax return
sole_proprietorship.drawbacks: Self-employment tax on all profits, unlimited liability

s_corporation.benefits: Save on self-employment tax, reasonable salary + distributions
s_corporation.drawbacks: More complex, must pay reasonable salary
s_corporation.tax_savings_example: On $100k profit: Save ~$7,650 in SE tax

c_corporation.benefits: Lower corporate tax rate (21%), retain earnings
c_corporation.note: Owner still files personal 1040 for salary, dividends, capital gains

calculators_and_projections.tax_liability_calculator: Calculate total tax owed based on income, deductions, credits
calculators_and_projections.penalty_calculator: Calculate penalties for late filing, underpayment
calculators_and_projections.savings_calculator: Compare sole prop vs LLC vs S corp vs C corp tax savings
calculators_and_projections.estimated_tax_calculator: Quarterly estimated tax payments for 1099 contractors

crypto_taxes.taxable_events: Trading crypto, selling crypto, earning crypto income
crypto_taxes.form: Form 8949 and Schedule D on Form 1040

investment_taxes.short_term_gains: Held < 1 year, taxed as ordinary income

real_estate_rental_income.passive_income: Generally passive if not real estate professional
real_estate_rental_income.deductions: Depreciation, mortgage interest, property tax, repairs, management fees

partnership_taxation.k1_distribution: Partners receive Schedule K-1 showing their share of income/loss
partnership_taxation.passive_investment: Limited partners usually report passive income/loss
partnership_taxation.tax_treatment: Pass-through entity, no tax at partnership level

buy_or_sell_assets.property: Depreciation recapture on rental property sales
buy_or_sell_assets.stocks: Short-term or long-term capital gains rates
